BasicInfo.short: You relax. We take care of the paperwork. Cover song licensing, digital distribution, and music rights solutions.

Products.name: Loudr Distribution
Products.description: The world's only digital digital distribution platform with built-in cover song licensing. Deliver music to iTunes, Google, Amazon and more

Products.name: Loudr For Business
Products.description: Products and services that power music rights for digital platforms

Products.name: Loudr Licensing
Products.description: A la carte cover song licensing platform. Get a license to sell cover songs anywhere: as a digital download, interactive stream, CD or vinyl
